name: Jackalwere

actions.name: Bite (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sleep Gaze (Gaze, Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: One creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere makes a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save  the target is magically charmed. At the beginning of the jackalweres next turn  the target repeats the saving throw. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes. Both the charmed and unconscious conditions end if the target takes damage or a creature within reach of the target uses an action to shake the target back to its senses. If the target successfully saves against Sleep Gaze  it is immune to Sleep Gaze for 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to charm arent affected by it.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The jackalwere radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The jackalwere has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The jackalwere has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the jackalweres allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Truth Aversion
special_abilities.desc: The jackalwere must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw to make a true statement. On a failure, it tells an unpremeditated lie.
